name: Katazuke
description:
In this multiplayer game inspired by Marie Kondo Konmari's methods you have to pick the clothes from your Bed, fold them in the desk and decide if it brings happyness or not. Put them in the closet if so or in the cardboard box otherwise. The first one to pick all clothes on the bed and thanks their disposed clothes wins! Good luck!

--

This game supports 2 controllers and 2 keyboard settings: WASD+Space and Arrow keys + M button.
